name: Europa Universalis III: Heir to the Throne
name_original: Europa Universalis III: Heir to the Throne
description:
Europa Universalis III: Heir to the Throne is a strategy game developed by Paradox Interactive. It came out on 15-12-2009. It was published by Paradox Interactive. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Europa Universalis III: Heir to the Throne is available on PC.
Johan Andersson produced the game. Andreas Waldetoft scored the game.
